line.text: They that have power to hurt and will do none
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That do not do the thing they most do show
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who moving others are themselves as stone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Unmoved cold and to temptation slow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: They rightly do inherit heaven graces
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And husband nature riches from expense
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Tibey are the lords and owners of their faces
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Others but stewards of their excellence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The summer flower is to the summer sweet
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Though to it self it only live and die
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But if that flower with base infection meet
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The basest weed outbraves his dignity
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For sweetest things turn sourest by their deeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Lilies that fester smell far worse than weeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
